articles.author: Dom Calicchio
articles.title: New York City man, 60, beaten by muggers over $1 in brutal attack caught on video
articles.description: Surveillance video shows a group of muggers punching, kicking and stomping on a 60-year-old man in New York City early Tuesday, in an attack that left the victim critically injured.
articles.content:
Surveillance video shows a group of muggers punching, kicking and stomping on a 60-year-old man in New York City early Tuesday, in an attack that left the victim critically injured.
The suspects, who remained at large early Wednesday, got only one dollar fro… [+824 chars]

articles.author: Jack Durschlag
articles.title: Pennsylvania grandmother, a retired teacher, among 4 killed in Israeli bus crash
articles.description: A Pennsylvania woman who taught school in the Philadelphia area has been identified as one of four people killed Sunday in a bus accident in Israel, reports said Tuesday.
articles.content:
A Pennsylvania grandmother who taught school in the Philadelphia area has been identified as one of four people killed Sunday in a bus accident in Israel, reports said Tuesday.
Police announced Monday that the bus driver was being held on distraction or negl… [+3025 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Indonesia bus plunges into ravine, sending at least 28 to their deaths
articles.description: A bus plunged into a ravine on Indonesia's Sumatra island after its brakes apparently malfunctioned, killing at least 28 people and injuring 13 others, police and rescuers said Tuesday.
articles.content:
PALEMBANG, Indonesia  — A bus plunged into a ravine on Indonesia's Sumatra island after its brakes apparently malfunctioned, killing at least 28 people and injuring 13 others, police and rescuers said Tuesday.
The accident occurred just before midnight Monda… [+2343 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Guatemala bus crash kills at least 20 people
articles.description: A trailer truck collided with a passenger bus in eastern Guatemala early Saturday, killing at least 20 people and leaving a dozen wounded, according to the national disaster agency. It said nine of the dead were minors.
articles.content:
GUATEMALA CITY — A trailer truck collided with a passenger bus in eastern Guatemala early Saturday, killing at least 20 people and leaving a dozen wounded, according to the national disaster agency. It said nine of the dead were minors.

articles.author: Dom Calicchio
articles.title: ESPN’s Edward Aschoff dies at 34, weeks after pneumonia disclosure
articles.description: Edward Aschoff, a radio and television reporter on college football for ESPN, died Tuesday after a brief illness, according to the network. His death came on Christmas Eve, which was his 34th birthday.
articles.content:
Edward Aschoff, a radio and television reporter on college football for ESPN, died Tuesday after a brief illness, according to the network. His death came on Christmas Eve, which was his 34th birthday.
